name: 2-in-1 Mega Game Madness
description:
Mega Game Madness packs into two different games: Story Quest & Boost Racer.

Story Quest is a 3D platformer containing 15 levels, 5 bosses, tons of collectibles, and 10 bonus challenge levels. Can you make it to the end!

Boost Racer is a platform-racing hybrid with tons of unique modes, a combined total of 20 tracks, and a big open world to explore.

There's also a lot of fun bonuses and extras to check out!

Midyear project for the Bronx Science Game Development class
